title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 647.3 - Advances and readvances under a credit line mortgage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 647.3 - Advances and readvances under a credit line mortgage

State Regulations

Tax Law, §§ 250, 253-b

Except as provided in section
647.4
of this Part, whenever the aggregate amount advanced or readvanced under a
credit line mortgage exceeds the maximum principal amount which was used to
compute the taxes described in Part 642 of this Title when such credit line
mortgage was recorded, further taxes must be paid upon the recording or filing
of an instrument evidencing such amounts advanced or readvanced. Such further
taxes are computed based upon the amount advanced or
readvanced. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
647.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
